TopicTitle: This Week's "Holiday Takeoff" Print Prize is the Kerbal Mechanic

Articles.Content:
<p><a href="http://bit.ly/1qPPZRb"><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/42ca05f41790ee85ec9894b5a4532aa8/tumblr_inline_nf7es1ikgJ1rr2wit.jpg"/></a></p>

<p><span>@BubbleMapGames, @AzureAngel17, @MichaelMaloneNZ and @agent3012 all came away with prizes in last week’s leg of the “Holiday Takeoff” sweepstakes. Up for grabs this week are Shapeways discount codes, a KSP Steam code and the Kerbal Mechanic 3D print from Shapeways.</span><br/><br/><span>Gear up for this Friday’s sweepstakes by reading all about it <a href="http://bit.ly/1qPPZRb"><strong>HERE</strong></a>.</span></p>
